meanings.definition: To scream louder than someone else.
meanings.sent1: During the concert, Sarah outscreamed all her friends.
meanings.sent2: The little girl outscreamed her brother in excitement.
meanings.sent3: The cat outscreamed the dog when they saw a mouse.
meanings.sent4: The thunderstorm outscreamed the howling wind.
meanings.sent5: Her joy outscreamed any other emotion she felt.

meanings.sent1: Yesterday, she outscreamed everyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: He outscreamed his opponent in the shouting match.
meanings.sent3: The ghost from last night outscreamed all the other ghosts.
meanings.sent4: The fireworks display outscreamed the cheers of the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The alarm clock outscreamed the chirping birds outside.
